pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:6.3: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:6.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:6.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.4: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karothā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.7: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.8: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:8.2: “Na udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:9.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.2: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.4: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.5: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.6: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:11.1: “Na udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:12.1: Na udake agilānena uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:12.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
